website_summaries.verdict: The ease of a Post-it note in flip chart size.
pros: Includes a cardboard topper with a hole for easy hanging while in use
Comes as a set of six flip charts
Each page has sticky Post-it glue on it for easy of removal and sticking to the wall
Works great for presenters and workshops
cons: The pad is not designed to stick to the wall itself
You will need some kind of easel or way to hang it for easy use

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price on warehouse deals!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a high school teacher that uses this product for end-of-year assessment reviews and place them around my walls. This is a phenomenal product on many different levels. It very easily moves from the students desks to the walls. It is also within the requirements of what is allowed to be used on the walls according to district and school policy so it doesn't ruin the paint. The paper is very sturdy and also does not tear easily. The writing surface is clean white and I have used Expo markers Sharpies and regular Crayola markers and they have all worked without smearing. I also received this from Amazon warehouse deals which was a phenomenal price.
customer_reviews.author: Keefus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the times!
customer_reviews.text: I love to use these for my Zoom lessons. I can use them for all my games, etc. and then I can write big to show up on Zoom.
customer_reviews.author: SmellyMellys

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these pads to use in meetings but I have used mine in class as well. I had never seen these before until someone brought one to a presentation they did here at our school. We will be keeping these on hand!
customer_reviews.author: forg2011

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive is so strong that it can grip the page. Definitely useful in a classroom!
customer_reviews.text: PRO:Way cheaper than STAPLES CON: it would be nice if you could write on the back page easily...The adhesive is so strong that it can grip the page. Definitely useful in a classroom!
customer_reviews.author: L Rodz

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well!
customer_reviews.text: I work in training and development and use these all the time. I wish they cost less but the generic non-post-it do not work as well (don’t stink and stay up on the walls) so for that I will stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Heikes

customer_reviews.title: SCHOOL PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I order Amazon for a public school district. This must be okay to recommend b/c I didn't hear any complaints (and believe me I would have.)
customer_reviews.author: CJ Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quick ship, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, name brand product. Delivered quickly at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Tenbrook`

customer_reviews.title: Work Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: These work so well. Our teachers loved them and use them constantly in their classrooms. They stick very well right on the wall and you do not need a board to hang them up. They do not leave any residue on the walls at all. You can leave them up for as long as you need or take them down right away. The kids love them too, makes it easy for them to work on projects around the classroom and to show off their work.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C Clow

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I received white flip charts against a yellow card board. They have been perfect. Arrived well-packaged, on time, and in good condition. They work well for my training classes. I use Expo markers on them and they don't seem to bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best deal I can find on post it easel pads. Looks like the one in the picture and it came in one convenient box.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about giant post-it notes? These were great in my training, because we could stick them on walls when it was time for groups to report out.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritedOne

customer_reviews.title: This is my second batch that have come unattached.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the post it pads were detached from the cardboard easel. I don't feel like loading this big, heavy thing back in my car so not returning. Think I'll buy in smaller amounts next time.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. But i wait until they are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer gorman-stokes

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and great price. Quality the same as other stores - very good!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Berberena

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazon’s prices and great delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product for training and Amazon’s price and delivery!!! Thank you from a grateful customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Habina McGlinchey

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 pack
customer_reviews.text: i opened my package 2 hours before I needed to use them and found 6 pads was included but 1 had no sheets attached. Very disappointed since this is not a cheap item to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney L Creson-Vats

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these easels! Our presenters love that they can peel them off and stick them around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Caban

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Large sticky pad I will purchase! They stick well and never bleed through!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good product! a bit pricey and a bit smaller
customer_reviews.author: Jose Agudelo

customer_reviews.title: Defective Pads
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 6 pads came detached partially or completely from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Y.

customer_reviews.title: paper not stapled to flipchart cardboard - it won't stay up
customer_reviews.text: 2/6 flip charts were not attached to the flipchart itself and the paper would not adhere to the cardboard- the staples were not placed correctly and the paper just falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good sticky
customer_reviews.text: We use these for work and they stick great to the walls without damaging anything
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what we need and great value. Package came slightly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Progressive Alloy Steels

customer_reviews.title: The staff at my school love these! They were a great buy from Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: The staff at my school love these! They were a great buy from Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pad, 25 x 30 Inches, 30 Sheets/Pad, 6 Pads (559VAD6PK), Large White Premium Self Stick Flip Chart Paper, Super Sticking Power
product_meta.description: Style:SingleIt’s an amazing feeling when your team just clicks—everyone feels a shared drive toward success. But, how do you ignite that feeling on every team? Capture the spark at your next meeting with Post it Super Sticky Easel Pads. Adhesive backed sheets stick and restick to hold up to 2X longer* to most wall surfaces, unlike flip chart paper. The paper resists marker bleed through so you can capture input by writing directly on the sheet. Use with Post it Super Sticky Notes to organize ideas. Download the free Post it App to instantly capture and save your work so you can share notes with the team without recaps or delays.
feature_bullets: STICKS SECURELY AND HOLDS UP TO 2X LONGER - Easel paper can be repositioned without surface damage. No tape or tacks needed unlike standard flip chart paper. Keep agenda and ideas where everyone can see.
INK BLEED-THROUGH RESISTANT PAPER - Large white premium self-stick flip chart paper that resists marker bleed-through to keep great ideas on the page, not on what's under the page.

IDEAL FOR BRAINSTORMING AND MANAGING PROJECTS - Perfect for training or teaching sessions, brainstorming sessions, planning sessions, project management and agile processes, meetings and presentations.
LARGE WHITE PREMIUM PAPER - 25 in. x 30 in., 30 Sheets/Pad, 6 Pad/Pack
DESIGNED TO FIT MANY EASEL STANDS - Sturdy backcard has a handle to make the easel pad portable and slots to fit most easel stands. Perfect for student activities and training sessions.
USE WITH POST-IT SUPER STICKY NOTES - The large, stickable paper to capture thoughts with Post-it Super Sticky Notes. Give ideas a place to grow.
EXPLORE OPTIONS - Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pads are also available with Grid Lines, Lines, Bright Yellow, and White Recycled Paper.
EXPLORE SIZES - Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pads also available in more sizes - Mini Easel Pad, Tabletop Pad and Wall Pad.
USA - Made in the USA with globally sourced materials.

DOWNLOAD THE FREE POST-IT APP - Stop spending hours transcribing notes after a brainstorm; download the free Post-it App. Now you can instantly capture and save your work so you can share notes with your team without recaps or delays.
